data.title: The DNA, RNA, and Histone Methylomes [1st ed. 2019] 978
data.meta_description: This book reviews the chemical, regulatory, and physiological mechanisms of protein arginine and lysine methyltransferas...
data.text:
Table of contents :

Front Matter ....Pages i-xi

Establishment, Erasure and Synthetic Reprogramming of DNA Methylation in Mammalian Cells (Renata Z. Jurkowska, Tomasz P. Jurkowski)....Pages 1-26

Origin and Mechanisms of DNA Methylation Dynamics in Cancers (Hariharan Easwaran, Stephen B. Baylin)....Pages 27-52

CpG Islands Methylation Alterations in Cancer: Functionally Intriguing Security Locks, Useful Early Tumor Biomarkers (Eleonora Loi, Patrizia Zavattari)....Pages 53-62

Histone and DNA Methylome in Neurodegenerative, Neuropsychiatric and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (Harsha Rani, Vijayalakshmi Mahadevan)....Pages 63-102

DNA Methylation in Neuronal Development and Disease (Emily C. Bruggeman, Bing Yao)....Pages 103-140

Functional Implications of Dynamic DNA Methylation for the Developing, Aging and Diseased Brain (Geraldine Zimmer-Bensch)....Pages 141-163

The Methylome of Bipolar Disorder: Evidence from Human and Animal Studies (Consuelo Walss-Bass, Gabriel R. Fries)....Pages 165-179

DNA Methylation in Multiple Sclerosis (Lara Kular, Maja Jagodic)....Pages 181-214

Early Life Stress and DNA Methylation (Annakarina Mundorf, Nadja Freund)....Pages 215-227

Regulation of 5-Hydroxymethylcytosine Distribution by the TET Enzymes (John Z. Cao, Anastasia E. Hains, Lucy A. Godley)....Pages 229-263

Epigenetic Alterations: The Relation Between Occupational Exposure and Biological Effects in Humans (Vivian Silva Kahl, Mónica Cappetta, Juliana Da Silva)....Pages 265-293

DNA Methylation: Biological Implications and Modulation of Its Aberrant Dysregulation (Alessia Lucidi, Daniela Tomaselli, Dante Rotili, Antonello Mai)....Pages 295-331

Functions and Dynamics of Methylation in Eukaryotic mRNA (Mingjia Chen, Claus-Peter Witte)....Pages 333-351

The Role of mRNA m6A in Regulation of Gene Expression (Sicong Zhang)....Pages 353-376

m6A mRNA Methylation in the Mammalian Brain: Distribution, Function and Implications for Brain Functions (Mareen Engel, Alon Chen)....Pages 377-398

G9a and G9a-Like Histone Methyltransferases and Their Effect on Cell Phenotype, Embryonic Development, and Human Disease (Carol A. Eisenberg, Leonard M. Eisenberg)....Pages 399-433

Biomolecular Recognition of Methylated Histones (Miriam R. B. Porzberg, Bas J. G. E. Pieters, Jasmin Mecinović)....Pages 435-451

The Role of Protein Lysine Methylation in the Regulation of Protein Function: Looking Beyond the Histone Code (Hemanta Adhikary, Orneala Bakos, Kyle K. Biggar)....Pages 453-477

Secondary Structures of Histone H3 Proteins with Unmethylated and Methylated Lysine-4 and -9 Residues: Characterization Using Circular Dichroism Spectroscopy (Yudai Izumi)....Pages 479-494

Asymmetric Dimethylation on Arginine (ADMA) of Histones in Development, Differentiation and Disease (Amit K. Behera, Tapas K. Kundu)....Pages 495-520

A Switch for Transcriptional Activation and Repression: Histone Arginine Methylation (Tian-Shi Wang, Jin-Ke Cheng, Qun-Ying Lei, Yi-Ping Wang)....Pages 521-541

Aberrant Epigenomic Regulatory Networks in Multiple Myeloma and Strategies for Their Targeted Reversal (Samrat Roy Choudhury, Brian A. Walker)....Pages 543-572

Metabolic Deregulations Affecting Chromatin Architecture: One-Carbon Metabolism and Krebs Cycle Impact Histone Methylation (Francisco Saavedra, Ekaterina Boyarchuk, Francisca Alvarez, Geneviève Almouzni, Alejandra Loyola)....Pages 573-606

Histone Methylome of the Human Parasite Schistosoma Mansoni (Ronaldo de Carvalho Augusto, Céline Cosseau, Christoph Grunau)....Pages 607-624
